ygData.subject: Re: A man with a plan
ygData.msgSnippet: Allright, Prodigy, that post is impossible for the following reasons: 1. The CF is on lockdown. There is no way to get into the CF. Also, the shields were up

Allright, Prodigy, that post is impossible for the following reasons:

1. The CF is on lockdown. There is no way to get into the CF. Also, 
the shields were up and only Firefox has the privelage of posting 
damage on the CF.  If you somehow did get in, you'd find that the 
bridge is under complete lockdown and can't be entered. If you 
somehow got through that, you would find that the main console is 
completely destroyed, as are most of the other consoles, and that 
every computer in the area is covered with a foot-thick metal plate 
(bridge lockdown). Only Hysteria and Chordate can cancel the lockdown 
right now (Kluster's left arm was removed, and it had his comm on it, 
which was his way to communicate with the CF from a distance). 
Hysteria's comp is destroyed too I think, and Chordate is a hostage 
right now, so the lockdown is stuck in place. There is also a 
lockdown in the room containing the main core, so you wouldn't be 
able to get in there either.

2. I don't think portable endless power-sources like that one are 
fair, so I'm not going to allow it (unless a whole lot of people want 
it).

3. Please post damage for all your chars.

4. Rhinox wasn't in the CF. He was outside when the lockdown took 
place, and therefore couldn't have gotten inside.
